description:
Naturally scented with Peppermint oil & Liquorice extract, this gentle milky face wash smells phenomenal and has been formulated to brighten, soothe and clean dry & sensitive skin while working to prevent the production of dark spots. With Vitamin E and Magnolia Bark extract to help protect your skin from free radicals, this face wash is the perfect step towards ditching the soap bar. 

  • 2 x 200ml Woodsman Face Wash for Dry & Sensitive Skin

Woodsman Skincare is an Australian-made skincare label for men. We prove that when it comes to taking care of their skin, Aussie men can choose premium without the hefty price tag. We use high quality, natural ingredients, and eco-friendly packaging you'll be proud to show off in your bathroom. Our range is straight to the point and easy to use, and while our formulations are premium, our prices are not. All Woodsman products are vegan and cruelty free and all bottles are made using recycled plastics.
name: Woodsman Skincare 400ML
